name: Isaac 5
description:
An astronaut has been sent to Mars to help the researchers based on Mars NASA. The exploration pours unexpected implications and it will be necessary to solve a mystery.

Isaac 5 is a sci-fi escape room. Your task is to leave the base before that something of scary can find you, finding any items and security codes you can find along the way.

This game was  developed during the course "Realtà Virtuale" of the Politecnico di Torino.
